about_the_game:
Can a single Unreal Engine developer create a decent online multiplayer shooter with little to no budget?
Yes!
Can I compete with AAA studios?
No But, This game does has game-modes you know from AAA games in this genre and will try to mimic the overall look and feel of modern day shooters.
Combined with state of the art graphics and a fully dynamic time and weather system!
(you should bring a beefy computer to optimally experience the graphics at it fullest. But it can always be tuned to lower end hardware in the settings menu.)

The game has tree game modes you can play with your friends
- Conquest, Dominate the capture points and kill the enemy in order to win with your team
- Rush, Try to detonate a series of bombs, or try to defend them.
- Free for All, just want to aimlessly shoot everything that moves? we got you covered!

Every game mode has it's own unique map that is designed with care and passion.
I'm planning to add more maps and game modes during the further development of this game.
The best part: you can be part of it. Because I'm always open to suggestions via the FleurBird YouTube channel's comment section.
most parts of the development will also be documented and can be found at the same channel.


Come and see for yourself!

name: FleurBirdShoot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX750Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible

short_description: Can a single Unreal Engine developer create a decent online multiplayer shooter with little to no budget? This game has game-modes you know from AAA games. Combined with state of the art graphics and a dynamic time and weather system. Come and see for yourself!
